channel.title: I need a unaversel run.bat for my client to distribute
channel.description: ok well my servers online and all but my client wont work .. i need a good run.bat code please post urs and be sure it works when ur servers online and other ppl connect to your server. if this isint what i should do to resolve this prob please clear me out.

item.title: I need a unaversel run.bat for my client to distribute
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

try these?

â€“ 32 Bits â€“@echo off color 77 title UltimateGodz echo Running UltimateGodz -- best 317 server "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_1\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m EGUI pause

â€“ 64 bits â€“

@echo off cls title UltimateGodz "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_1\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m client 82 highmem -cp pause
